text: For our website, we will use your information to respond to you, regarding the reason you contacted us.
Through our website at www.welcomehomesoftware.com , we collect email addresses of visitors.
Through our applications, we also collect information about what our clients provide to us.

data_type: information you give we via email
text: We only have access to/collect information that you voluntarily give us via email or through our website and application forms.

data_type: information you provide about prospect lead
text: For our applications, we will use the information you provide about your prospects/leads, only to perform lead scoring services, which you require us to do, through a preexisting contract.
We only use the information that you provide us voluntarily.
We will retain your Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Notice unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
Wherever we collect sensitive information, that information is encrypted and transmitted to us in a secure way.
Welcome Home Software ("us", "we", or "our") operates the www.welcomehomesoftware.com website.
